channel.title: Project - Back to Sanity
channel.description:
Hey guys :D Originally I was planning on writing a whole server from scratch but realized it would take too much time for an unexperienced programmer like myself. So I decided to take an existing source and rewrite it.
I don't want any rage/flame/suicide(lol) comments about it being a PI ; I'm not building on the shit anyways... I'm breaking it down to make it a better source :D
I'll be using the original PI , mainly because I can't be fucked to delete 600 or 500+ content from the client aswell <.< (there's enough shit to remove in the server already)
So here's some quick notes about what I'm trying to achieve : [code] * Improve the way packets are being handled * Add scripting * Re-write combat (just now I realize that I'll probably kill myself doing that...) * Clip stuff * Remove all the content currently present in the base * Change client to 459 if possible (the gameframe) * In the end , server sided content (if I continue) will also be 459 , so you won't see any godswords or stuff. [/code]
Thanks to [b]RiiPiiNFtW[/b] for providing me with [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,495936.0.html]the original PI base :D[/url]
As a proof of development I shall regularly post my updates to the code here (because visually I can't show you anything in the game...)
So with that being said , lets start :D
UPDATE LIST: [code] 3/10/2011 * Cleaned up the ActionHandler class. * Cleaned up NPC spawns , drops , shops , constants. * Removed mass saving. * Added individual save (every 1hour) will change later when I add disconnecting. * Removed all dialogues. 4/10/2011 * Decided to delay the scripts * Thread per client has been removed * Main thread has been added. * Added idle checking 10minutes of no activity = auto logout * Individual save has been changed to once every minute [/code]

item.title: Project - Back to Sanity
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Native^:

459 has godswords. But good luck.

I thought 459 was right before gwd?
I think gwd was released at 470+ or somthing
Is there any list with the builds and updates???

EDIT : moved the whole Client.process() method to the new GameTick class.
It should be called straight from the Server class. (take note of the other minigames and such that are handled the same way)
The GameTick class goes in the Server.model.players package.

GameTick class:

[code=java]package server.model.players;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.Config;
import server.Server;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.util.Stream;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;

public class GameTick {

/**
	@author Cres
*/

public GameTick() {
}

public void tick() {
	/*
	Get all the players registered
	*/
	for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
		/*
		Nullcheck on all the clients
		*/
		if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
			Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
			//TODO stuff goes here

			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.specDelay > Config.INCREASE_SPECIAL_AMOUNT) {
				c.specDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
				if(c.specAmount < 10) {
						c.specAmount += .5;
					if (c.specAmount > 10)
						c.specAmount = 10;
					c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
				}
			}

			if (c.clickObjectType > 0 && c.goodDistance(c.objectX + c.objectXOffset, c.objectY + c.objectYOffset, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.objectDistance)) {
				if (c.clickObjectType == 1) {
					c.getActions().firstClickObject(c.objectId, c.objectX, c.objectY);
				}
				if (c.clickObjectType == 2) {
					c.getActions().secondClickObject(c.objectId, c.objectX, c.objectY);
				}
				if (c.clickObjectType == 3) {
					c.getActions().thirdClickObject(c.objectId, c.objectX, c.objectY);
				}
			}

			if ((c.clickNpcType > 0) && Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex] != null) {		
				if (c.goodDistance(c.getX(), c.getY(), Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getX(), Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getY(), 1)) {
					if (c.clickNpcType == 1) {
						c.turnPlayerTo(Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getX(), Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getY());
						Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].facePlayer(c.playerId);
						c.getActions().firstClickNpc(c.npcType);
					}
					if (c.clickNpcType == 2) {
						c.turnPlayerTo(Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getX(), Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getY());
						Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].facePlayer(c.playerId);
						c.getActions().secondClickNpc(c.npcType);
					}
					if (c.clickNpcType == 3) {
						c.turnPlayerTo(Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getX(), Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].getY());
						Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcClickIndex].facePlayer(c.playerId);
						c.getActions().thirdClickNpc(c.npcType);
					}
				}
			}
			
			if (c.walkingToItem) {
				if (c.getX() == c.pItemX && c.getY() == c.pItemY || c.goodDistance(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.pItemX, c.pItemY,1)) {
					c.walkingToItem = false;
					Server.itemHandler.removeGroundItem(c, c.pItemId, c.pItemX, c.pItemY, true);
				}
			}
			
			if (c.followId > 0) {
				c.getPA().followPlayer();
			} else if (c.followId2 > 0) {
				c.getPA().followNpc();
			}
			
			c.getCombat().handlePrayerDrain();
			
			if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.singleCombatDelay >  3300) {
				c.underAttackBy = 0;
			}
			
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.singleCombatDelay2 > 3300) {
				c.underAttackBy2 = 0;
			}
			
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.restoreStatsDelay >  60000) {
				c.restoreStatsDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
				for (int level = 0; level < c.playerLevel.length; level++)  {
					if (c.playerLevel[level] < c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[level])) {
						if (level != 5) { // prayer doesn't restore
							c.playerLevel[level] += 1;
							c.getPA().setSkillLevel(level, c.playerLevel[level], c.playerXP[level]);
							c.getPA().refreshSkill(level);
						}
					} else if (c.playerLevel[level] > c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[level])) {
						c.playerLevel[level] -= 1;
						c.getPA().setSkillLevel(level, c.playerLevel[level], c.playerXP[level]);
						c.getPA().refreshSkill(level);
					}
				}
			}
			
			if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.teleGrabDelay >  1550 && c.usingMagic) {
				c.usingMagic = false;
				if(Server.itemHandler.itemExists(c.teleGrabItem, c.teleGrabX, c.teleGrabY)) {
					Server.itemHandler.removeGroundItem(c, c.teleGrabItem, c.teleGrabX, c.teleGrabY, true);
				}
			}
			
			if (c.inWild()) {
				int modY = c.absY > 6400 ?  c.absY - 6400 : c.absY;
				c.wildLevel = (((modY - 3520) / 8) + 1);
				c.getPA().walkableInterface(197);
				if (Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
					if (c.inMulti()) {
						c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+c.wildLevel, 199);
					} else {
						c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+c.wildLevel, 199);
					}
				} else {
					c.getPA().multiWay(-1);
					c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+c.wildLevel, 199);
				}
				c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
			} else if (c.inDuelArena()) {
				c.getPA().walkableInterface(201);
				if (c.duelStatus == 5) {
					c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
				} else {
					c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 1);
				}
			} else if (c.inBarrows()){
				c.getPA().sendFrame99(2);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("Kill Count: "+c.barrowsKillCount, 4536);
				c.getPA().walkableInterface(4535);
			} else if (c.inCwGame || c.inPits) {
				c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);	
			} else if (c.getPA().inPitsWait()) {
				c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1);
			} else if (!c.inCwWait) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame99(0);
				c.getPA().walkableInterface(-1);
				c.getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Null", 1);
			}
			
			if (!c.hasMultiSign && c.inMulti()) {
				c.hasMultiSign = true;
				c.getPA().multiWay(1);
			}
			
			if (c.hasMultiSign && !c.inMulti()) {
				c.hasMultiSign = false;
				c.getPA().multiWay(-1);
			}

			if (c.skullTimer > 0) {
				c.skullTimer--;
				if (c.skullTimer == 1) {
					c.isSkulled = false;
					c.attackedPlayers.clear();
					c.headIconPk = -1;
					c.skullTimer = -1;
					c.getPA().requestUpdates();
				}	
			}
			
			if (c.isDead && c.respawnTimer == -6) {
				c.getPA().applyDead();
			}
			
			if (c.respawnTimer == 7) {
				c.respawnTimer = -6;
				c.getPA().giveLife();
			} else if (c.respawnTimer == 12) {
				c.respawnTimer--;
				c.startAnimation(0x900);
				c.poisonDamage = -1;
			}	
			
			if (c.respawnTimer > -6) {
				c.respawnTimer--;
			}
			
			if (c.freezeTimer > -6) {
				c.freezeTimer--;
				if (c.frozenBy > 0) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.frozenBy] == null) {
						c.freezeTimer = -1;
						c.frozenBy = -1;
					} else if (!c.goodDistance(c.absX, c.absY, Server.playerHandler.players[c.frozenBy].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[c.frozenBy].absY, 20)) {
						c.freezeTimer = -1;
						c.frozenBy = -1;
					}
				}
			}
			
			if(c.hitDelay > 0) {
				c.hitDelay--;
			}
			
			if (c.teleTimer > 0) {
				c.teleTimer--;
				if (!c.isDead) {
					if (c.teleTimer == 1 && c.newLocation > 0) {
						c.teleTimer = 0;
						c.getPA().changeLocation();
					}
					if (c.teleTimer == 5) {
						c.teleTimer--;
						c.getPA().processTeleport();
					}
					if (c.teleTimer == 9 && c.teleGfx > 0) {
						c.teleTimer--;
						c.gfx100(c.teleGfx);
					}
				} else {
					c.teleTimer = 0;
				}
			}	

			if (c.hitDelay == 1) {
				if (c.oldNpcIndex > 0) {
					c.getCombat().delayedHit(c.oldNpcIndex);
				}
				if (c.oldPlayerIndex > 0) {
					c.getCombat().playerDelayedHit(c.oldPlayerIndex);				
				}		
			}
			
			if (c.attackTimer > 0) {
				c.attackTimer--;
			}
			
			if (c.attackTimer == 1){
				if (c.npcIndex > 0 && c.clickNpcType == 0) {
					c.getCombat().attackNpc(c.npcIndex);
				}
				if (c.playerIndex > 0) {
					c.getCombat().attackPlayer(c.playerIndex);
				}
			} else if (c.attackTimer <= 0 && (c.npcIndex > 0 || c.playerIndex > 0)) {
				if (c.npcIndex > 0) {
					c.attackTimer = 0;
					c.getCombat().attackNpc(c.npcIndex);
				} else if (c.playerIndex > 0) {
					c.attackTimer = 0;
					c.getCombat().attackPlayer(c.playerIndex);
				}
			}
			
			if (c.timeOutCounter > Config.TIMEOUT) {
				c.disconnected = true;
			}
			
			c.timeOutCounter++;
			
			if (c.inTrade && c.tradeResetNeeded){
				Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.tradeWith];
				if(o != null){
					if(o.tradeResetNeeded){
						c.getTradeAndDuel().resetTrade();
						o.getTradeAndDuel().resetTrade();
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Project - Back to Sanity
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Hey guys
Originally I was planning on writing a whole server from scratch but realized it would take too much time for an unexperienced programmer like myself.
So I decided to take an existing source and rewrite it.

I don’t want any rage/flame/suicide(lol) comments about it being a PI ; I’m not building on the shit anyways…
I’m breaking it down to make it a better source

I’ll be using the original PI , mainly because I can’t be fucked to delete 600 or 500+ content from the client aswell <.< (there’s enough shit to remove in the server already)

So here’s some quick notes about what I’m trying to achieve :

* Improve the way packets are being handled
* Add scripting
* Re-write combat (just now I realize that I'll probably kill myself doing that...)
* Clip stuff
* Remove all the content currently present in the base
* Change client to 459 if possible (the gameframe)
* In the end , server sided content (if I continue) will also be 459 , so you won't see any godswords or stuff.

Thanks to RiiPiiNFtW for providing me with the original PI base

As a proof of development I shall regularly post my updates to the code here (because visually I can’t show you anything in the game…)

So with that being said , lets start

UPDATE LIST:

3/10/2011
* Cleaned up the ActionHandler class.
* Cleaned up NPC spawns , drops , shops , constants.
* Removed mass saving.
* Added individual save (every 1hour) will change later when I add disconnecting.
* Removed all dialogues.
4/10/2011
* Decided to delay the scripts
* Thread per client has been removed
* Main thread has been added.
* Added idle checking 10minutes of no activity = auto logout
* Individual save has been changed to once every minute

Read full topic
